meanings.definition: Protected from a disease or the like, as by inoculation.
meanings.sent1: The vaccinated children were immunes to the flu.
meanings.sent2: She became immunes to chickenpox after getting the vaccine.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's special suit made him immunes to all harm.
meanings.sent4: The ancient shield was like an immunes barrier against any attack.
meanings.sent5: The magical potion granted immunes powers to those who drank it.

meanings.definition: A person who is immune to a particular infection.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the immunes were safe from the virus.
meanings.sent2: She was one of the immunes who never got sick.
meanings.sent3: The immunes at the party were the only ones who didn't catch the cold.
meanings.sent4: He was like an immunes fortress, impervious to any illness.
meanings.sent5: The immunes were like a shield protecting the village from the disease.
